Source.Name: syncthing
Source.Summary: Syncthing is an open-source file synchronization client/server application
Source.Description: Syncthing is an open-source file synchronization client/server application, written in Go, implementing its own, equally free Block Exchange Protocol. All transit communications between syncthing nodes are encrypted, and all nodes are uniquely identified with cryptographic certificates.

Package.Name: syncthing
Package.Summary: Syncthing is an open-source file synchronization client/server application
Package.Description: Syncthing is an open-source file synchronization client/server application, written in Go, implementing its own, equally free Block Exchange Protocol. All transit communications between syncthing nodes are encrypted, and all nodes are uniquely identified with cryptographic certificates.
